This game has a steep learning curve but is a highly enjoyable competitive first person shooter.

The graphics are good and able to run perfectly on mid end systems but if you are going to play at higher competitive levels you probably want hardware to match.

The casual modes are plagued by cheaters as anyone can play these since CS:GO went free to play.

Cheaters do appear in competitive matches but VAC can catch them and if they are reported by enough members of your team they will be taken to the OVERWATCH system. If a cheater was found to be in your game the match is overturned as though the result didn't happen.

Overall the game is high quality, great sounds, visuals, a tried and tested rounds system. Well worth playing. I highly recommend it.
